title: BitTornado
body: I've been using an experimental version of <a href="http://bt.degreez.net/">TheSHAD0W's BitTorrent client</a> for awhile, but I switched back to the <a href="http://bitconjurer.org/BitTorrent/download.html">default BitTorrent client</a> when the latest version came out.  After getting sick of the stupid alerts that come up when you get server errors I found <a href="http://bittornado.com/">BitTornado 0.1.1</a> when trying to find TheSHAD0W's version.  So far it's worked great and has a few minor improvements over previous versions of TheSHAD0W's client.
